txt.en: 'We will start shortly. I encourage you to join us, for you are a welcome guest of this house.'
Éowyn sits upon the king's seat in Meduseld.\n\nYou should observe the lady's meeting with her stewards.
TBD - this needs to flow better
Éowyn can be found standing outside of Meduseld, looking out over Edoras.\n\nYou should speak with Éowyn to find out how you can help aid in moving the city.

'You wish to help us out the door for our journey to Dunharrow? It will not be an easy task, you know, but I would never turn down such a generous offer.\n\n'Léodferth, Théolac, and Britred will be glad of your aid, [placeholder]. They are able men, but they are hard-pressed.'
Éowyn stands proudly in Meduseld, hearing the concerns of her people before their departure to Dunharrow.

'I am glad to see you here, [placeholder]. I am about to hear the concerns of the stewards of Edoras on the eve of our departure to Dunharrow.\n\n'I welcome you to join us, friend. It will not take long, I assure you.'
Observe Éowyn's meeting with her stewards
